bike.description: All new 06 M5 S-Works hardtail, M5-XX alloy with ORE DT & TT, fully manipulated TT, DT, SS, CS, forged and relieved HT and BB shell, Asymmetric Mono-stay seatstays, disc mount, cold forged dropouts, replaceable derailleur hanger, 2 water bottle mounts

components.description: 1 1/8" threadless, intergrated 10mm insertion alloy cups, sealed cartridge bearing
Thomson, 7000 series aluminum, 2-bolt adjustable, set back head, 30.9mmx367/410mm
Chain stay/seat stay protector, derailleur protector, reflectors, owners manual
